pullrequest.title: Fix problems related to cppcheck in Wily

content.raw:
I could be speaking too fast, but if I had to bet just now, I would say that this keyword only affects the compiler behaviour (in fact, disable the compiler auto conversions), how the compiler threat your code, and probably has nothing to do with the API or the ABI.

The use cases that changes are the ones in the form `T obj = value` which probably can not consider as a valid use of the API.
content.html:
I could be speaking too fast, but if I had to bet just now, I would say that this keyword only affects the compiler behaviour (in fact, disable the compiler auto conversions), how the compiler threat your code, and probably has nothing to do with the API or the ABI.

The use cases that changes are the ones in the form T obj = value which probably can not consider as a valid use of the API.
